text: (Kono-ko ga) kare to tomoni hataraku toshigoro ni natta toki, kare wa itta. `Musuko yo, watashi wa anata o gisei ni sasageru yume o mimashita. Sā, anata wa dō kangaeru nodesu ka.' Kare wa (kotaete) itta. `Chichiyo, anata ga meiji rareta yō ni shite kudasai. Moshi arrā ga o nozominaraba, watashi ga taeshinobu koto ga o wakarideshou
